children.text: License agreement for using mobile application called "Geo Tracker – GPS tracker"
I accept the terms in the License Agreement

Moscow, Russian Federation
 version dated 01/06/2016
 
 Notice that this text below is only English translation of the Agreement and is not legally binding in respect of relations between Parties arisen from or connected with use of the Software. Only Russian version of the Agreement is legally binding in respect of such relations between Parties and shall be applicable for them.
 
 TERMINOLOGY
 
 Software means mobile application for the Device called "Geo Tracker – GPS tracker", purposing for recording and rendering geographical coordinates of the Device, on which the Software is installed. Software is a computer program in meaning of Russian Civil Code.
 Rightholder means Ilya Bogdanovich, the RF citizen, who is the author of the Software and distributes the Software among general public.
 User means any capable person, who installed the Software on his/her Device and uses it.
 Device means a digital device of any type and form-factor (e.g. smartphone, tablet, but not limited to) operated by Android operational system, which has enough technical characteristics for installing the Software on it and future using by User.
 Agreement means License agreement for using the Software.
 Parties mean Rightholder and User together.
 If any of the terms or definitions in the text of the Agreement has no an explanation in the text of the Agreement, the meaning of such term or definitions shall be made based on the interpretation of the text of the Agreement. In case of absence the relevant interpretation in the text of the Agreement, the Parties shall follow the current legislation, and in case of absence in legislation - business practice and scientific doctrine.
 
 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
 
 1.1. The present Agreement regulates the relations between the Rightholder and the User on providing the Software by the Rightholder to the User and using the Software and all next new versions (updates) of the Software in case of their appearance by the User.
 1.2. The User, starting to use the Software, completely and unconditionally confirms his/her consent with all provisions of the Agreement in full. If the User is not agreed with provisions of the Agreement in full or in part, in this case the User has no right to use the Software and shall stop to use the Software immediately.
 1.3. In case of making alterations to the Agreement, the Rightholder has no obligation to inform the User about such alterations. The User shall monitor such alterations of the text of the Agreement on his/her own. If the Rightholder made alterations to the text of the Agreement, and the User is not agreed with such alterations in full or in part, in this case the User has no right to continue to use the Software and shall stop to use the Software immediately. If the Rightholder made alterations to the text of the Agreement, and the User continues to use the Software, in this case the User shall be regarded as agreed with the Agreement in its new edition in full.
 1.4. The Rightholder grants to the User right to use the Software for free of charge, so the provisions on customer protection, stated by current legislation, shall not be applied to relations between the Rightholder and the User on using the Software.
 1.5. The present Agreement is not a public offer in meaning of Russian Civil Code.
 
 2. TERMS OF USE
 
 2.1. For using the Software by the User, the Rightholder grants to the User a royalty-free, non-exclusive, worldwide license without a right to sublicense to third parties to use the Software by installing it on the Device and subsequent use within the functionality of the Software.
 2.2. The User has a right to use the Software in personal non-commercial purposes within the functionality of the Software only. The User has a right to install and use the Software on the unlimited quantity of the Devices.
 2.3. The User has no right to include the Software in any collection of software or other products, to modify the Software, decompile, disassembly the Software or otherwise access to object code or source code of the Software (except for cases provided by law), and use the Software for commercial purposes without the prior written consent of the Rightholder on it. The absence of such consent shall not be regarded as consent. In particular, the User has no right to provide the Software third parties for a charge.
 2.4. The User has no right to use the Software in any illegal purposes and in purposes, violating rights and/or legitimate interests of the Rightholder, other Users or third parties. In particular, the User has no right to use the Software for secret information gathering about other Users or third parties, as well as to create software or services based on the Software, designed for information gathering about other Users or third parties.
 2.5. The license granted by the Rightholder to the User for using the Software may be terminated (recalled) by the Rightholder at any moment. The Rightholder may, but not obliged to, notify the User about such termination, intentions, motives and purposes of granted license termination to the User.
 2.6. The Rightholder has a right to collect, process, store, study and analyze the statistics data from the Devices, on which the Software is installed, using as own software and hardware means as other similar means owned by third parties. Such statistics data do not include the User's personal data. The Rightholder has right to collect statistics data during the whole period of using the Software by the User until its removing from the Device. The Rightholder has right to process, store, study and analyze during the unlimited time period, even after stop using the Software by the User in case of removing it from the Device. At the same time, the Rightholder is not obliged to provide the User any report about his activity, connected with collecting, processing, storing, studying and analyzing statistics data.
 2.7. The Rightholder has right to send the User informational messages.
 2.8. The Software and also the information and other data, available within the Software, shall not be used to establish and/or confirm any facts.
 
 3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
 
 3.1. The rightholder is the author of the Software and has the exclusive right on it in full, except those intellectual property objects, which were included in the Software as third-party components and the exclusive right on which are belonged to the corresponded rightholders.
 3.2. None of provisions of the Agreement shall be regarded as alienation of exclusive right on the Software and/or any of intellectual property objects, included in the Software, by the Rightholder to the User or third party.
 
 4. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
 
 4.1. The Software is provided by the Rightholder to the User on "as is" conditions. The User, installing and using the Software, does it on his/her own risk and responsibility. The Rightholder does not guarantee to the User, that the Software will be worked on the Device in the proper manner, and also there are no any errors in the Software and the Software will satisfy expectations of the User.
 4.2. The Rightholder shall not be liable to the User or third parties for any actions of the User or third parties, and also for consequences connected with using the Software in any circumstances.
 4.3. The Rightholder shall not be liable to the User or third parties for any losses of the User or third parties incurred due to using the Software by the User in any circumstances. Lost profits are not refundable in any circumstances too.
 4.4. In any circumstances the liability of the Rightholder is limited by 10 000 (ten thousand) rubles in the money terms in accordance with clause 15 of the RF Civil Code and applicable only in cases of guilty actions of the Rightholder.
 4.5. The User shall be liable on his/her own and in full to the Rightholder, other Users or third parties for own actions related with using the Software, when such actions became the reason of coming of negative consequences or damages to the persons specified above, or if such actions led to the violation of law, or rights or legitimate interests of such persons.
 
 5. SETTLEMENT OF DISPUTES
 
 5.1. In case of any dispute between Parties on any reason, Parties are oblige to solve such dispute by negotiations. In case of impossibility of such solving the pre-trial order of solving the dispute is binding for Parties by sending a claim.
 5.2. In case of sending a claim to the Rightholder, a claim shall be sent on the following email of the Rightholder: legal@geo-tracker.org. The claim shall be regarded as received on the day after the day of sending it on the specified email. The Rightholder has right to deal with a claim and prepare an answer on it to the User during the 30 calendar days from the day of receiving the claim.
 5.3. All disputes between Parties arising from using the Software, shall be solved by Parties in accordance with provisions of the Agreement and current legislation of Russian Federation. All disputes, subject to court examination, shall be examined in the territory of the RF in Russian courts in accordance with current Russian procedure legislation.
 5.4. If the User breached or continues to breach any provision of the Agreement, and the Rightholder is inactive and does not stop such breach, such inactivity of the Rightholder shall not be interpreted as deprivation of the Rightholder the right to undertake necessary actions in future, directed to protection of his rights and legitimate interests and removal abovementioned breaches. Also such inactivity of the Rightholder shall not be interpreted as refusal of the Rightholder of his rights and legitimate interests, if the analogical or similar breach will be made by the User or third party in future.
 
 6. FINAL PROVISIONS
 
 6.1. All questions on using the Software, which are not regulated by the text of the Agreement, shall be solved in accordance with current Russian legislation.
 6.2. All provisions of the Agreement are independent from each other. If any provision of the Agreement will be regarded in accordance with law void or unacceptable, such invalidity of a provision of the Agreement does not affect validity or acceptability of other provisions of the Agreement, which continue to be valid.
 6.3. None of the provisions in the text of the Agreement shall be understand and interpreted as existing or establishing between the Rightholder or the User affiliation, partnership, sponsorship relations, relations on joint activity, agency, employment relationship or individual employment, or other relationship, which are not directly expressed in the text of the Agreement.
 6.4. The text of the Agreement in its actual edition is made in Russian and available to the User for examination as during the process of installing the Software, as in the relevant section "About - License Agreement" in the Software interface after it.
